Name: Manipulated
About the game: If you’re looking for an easy, relaxing platformer, then this game is NOT for you. To complete the game, you will need to be as brilliant as Einstein, as focused as Zuckerberg, and more creative than Da Vinci. Equipped only with your rocket launcher, your secret talent, and your wits you will journey deeper into this experiment… but take care not to be manipulated! Key Features: A captivating story that will keep you guessing Enough explosions for a Michael Bay movie Rocket launchers, psychic powers, and intense boss fights! Hilarious robot narrator that will have you cracking up Fantastic ending Game requirements: IQ of 120 or above At least two hands Your favorite computer
